meanings.definition: A group of people gathered together for a common purpose.
meanings.sent1: The school assembly listened attentively to the principal's speech.
meanings.sent2: The town assembly voted on the new community center project.
meanings.sent3: The assembly of superheroes made for an interesting comic book storyline.
meanings.sent4: The assembly of stars in the night sky was a breathtaking sight.
meanings.sent5: The assembly of colorful balloons created a festive atmosphere.

meanings.definition: The action of gathering together as a group.
meanings.sent1: The assembly of friends for a picnic was a joyful occasion.
meanings.sent2: The assembly of protesters marched peacefully through the streets.
meanings.sent3: The assembly of animals in the zoo made for a lively scene.
meanings.sent4: The assembly of clouds signaled an impending storm.
meanings.sent5: The assembly of ingredients resulted in a delicious meal.

meanings.definition: The act of assembling or putting together parts or components.
meanings.sent1: The assembly of the puzzle pieces took hours to complete.
meanings.sent2: The assembly of the new furniture was a challenging task.
meanings.sent3: The assembly of the model airplane ended up looking like a spaceship.
meanings.sent4: The assembly of the jigsaw puzzle revealed a beautiful picture.
meanings.sent5: The assembly of the Lego set required following detailed instructions.
